_description: On greed — four couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Werdis blisse maket me blindþat of my det I make no
                    mynd…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…þis werdis blisse is nouth treweffor after liking it
                    maket to rewe
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 4.
